message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.event.Event' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.event.EventFactory' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired'.
At-clause should have a non-empty description.
